availability.p: All research and writing of Civil War Governors of Kentucky Digital Documentary Edition annotations was undertaken by project staff, volunteers, and interns. Each record contains citations to relevant primary and secondary source material. All annotations are copyright Kentucky Historical Society, and should be referenced as such in any published work.

seriesStmt.title: Civil War Governors of Kentucky Digital Documentary Edition

person.persName: David Bartrim (Soldier in Big Sandy River valley)

body.p: Wayne County, West Virginia, farmer and soldier. Virginia native. Son of William Bartrum and Laurana Bartrum. Married to Eliza Jane Ratcliff Bartrim. Father of Wayne Bartrim and John B. Bartrim. Resident of Wayne County, Virginia, in 1850. Farmer in Wayne County, Virginia, in 1860. Signed petition and identified as one of a group of commanders of militia companies in the Big Sandy River Valley on December 18, 1862.

ab.bibl:
